name: Yeebo
description: Our extensive menu of over 300 dishes is the quintessence of traditional Chinese cuisine. The menu offers a wide range of dishes from nutritious Hotpot to Dimsum, and signature roasted dishes such as Pecking duck, roasted goose, top-of-the-range abalone, and cheese baked lobster just to name a few.

foodList.name: Shrimp Dumplings - Har Gow
foodList.description: Shrimp, bamboo shoots, sesame oil, cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar, xiaoxing wine, ginger, pepper, salt, dumpling flour

foodList.name: Shrimp Dumplings - Siu Mai
foodList.description: scallops, pork, starch, peanut oil, sesame oil, shrimp, mushrooms, ginger, scallions, oyster sauce, salt, sugar, pepper, carrots, dumpling wrappers

foodList.name: Yuan Yang Hot Pot
foodList.description: Double-flavor hot pot: one-half of the pot is filled with spicy broth, the other half is filled with non-spicy broth

foodList.name: Tube Bone & Nashi Pear Hotpot
foodList.description: A hotpot cooked from pork broth, jujube, Asian pears and snow mushroom as main ingredients that give the dish a natural, fruity sweetness & a very distinct flavor.
foodList.image: Yeebo- tube bone nashi pear hotpot

name: Coco Ichibanya
description:
'CURRY HOUSE CoCo ICHIBANYA',known as 'CoCoICHI', is a chain restaurant specializing in Japanese-style curry rice. 
 Many people enjoy making their very own CoCoICHI curry by customizing the rice portion, spice level, and optional toppings coming in nearly 40 varieties. Please enjoy our curry, which is very popular with the Japanese people!
